content: hi you ll find the full pattern free to view at the bottom of the blog post through the link this is a sampler style wrap that has a really nice drape and airy feel hope you like it description wrap yourself in this airy oversized shawl featuring open stitchwork and beautiful drape super cute paired with a tank or maxi dress yet versatile enough to wear with just about anything the various stitches and textures will keep you interested as you crochet while also creating a modern feminine accessory skill level easy + you should be comfortable with counting stitches and crocheting all basic stitches and chains materials us size j 6 0 mm crochet hook 4 lion brand yarn low tide in palm 100 g/skein find the convenient kit with the yarn and pattern from lion brand here in several colors pattern uses approximately 340 g measuring tape tapestry needle scissors dimensions 16 x 65 gauge not important for this pattern
